There was one other sighting in Denton on or around July 25th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was doing my occasional star gazing on the patio of my apartment I noticed a hovering triangle like object approximately around 12:30am. At first I thought It was a satellite but noticed that it wasn't conventional moving across the sky instead it was creating hovering like motions as well as moving back and forth and even covering up other stars in the night sky.
Summary: Unkown hovering object in night sky
